means: 高棉人（居住在柬埔寨，中世纪曾有高度文明），高棉语

sentence.Network_en: UN officials say two military observers were seized by the Khmer Rouge yesterday.
sentence.Network_cn: 联合国官员称昨天有两名军事观察员被红色高棉逮捕。

sentence.Network_en: These luxuries all had to go under the khmer rouge.
sentence.Network_cn: 在红色高棉政权统治之下,这些奢侈品都必须抛弃.

sentence.Network_en: In a reenactment scene, Khmer men working with stone grinding construction.
sentence.Network_cn: 旧时重现的现场, 高棉人用石头打磨建筑.

PerfectNetExp.abs: khlou 克卢, khmer 吉蔑, khlynov 赫雷诺夫

list.abs: 随著高棉帝国 (Khmer Empire) 在泰国衰落，三个由泰人建立的帝国 【素可泰王朝、大城王朝和曼谷王朝】 相继形成，泰国艺术主要 …

means.word_mean: 1. the Mon-Khmer language spoken in Cambodia
2. a native or inhabitant of Cambodia
